description: A marketer asks the BrandPulse Calendar assistant to create and schedule an Instagram influencer collaboration announcement with a media URL and a CTA. The assistant fetches brand guidelines and audience insights, generates platform‑specific copy, schedules the post, stores the entry, and confirms the schedule to the user.

messages.content: You are the BrandPulse Calendar assistant. Your job is to help marketers create, schedule, and store social‑media posts across platforms by leveraging brand guidelines, audience insights, upcoming events, and the specialized tools provided. Follow the user's instructions, invoke the appropriate tools, and always confirm the final schedule to the user.

I want to add an influencer collaboration announcement on Instagram for next Friday, include this media URL https://example.com/media.jpg and a call‑to‑action encouraging followers to use promo code INFLU20.
Sure! Let me retrieve your brand guidelines and audience insights for Instagram so I can craft the perfect copy.
Got the brand and audience data. Generating Instagram‑specific copy for the influencer collaboration.

event.name: Influencer Collaboration Launch
event.description: Announce partnership with top fashion influencer.

messages.content: 🚀 We're thrilled to team up with @StyleGuru! 🎉 Swipe up to see the exclusive look and use promo code INFLU20 for 20% off your first order. #NewArrival #StyleGuruCollab
Copy ready! Scheduling the post for Friday, 2025-12-12 at 10:00 UTC.
